meanings.definition: Relating to the arrangement of leaves on a stem.
meanings.sent1: The phyllotactic pattern of the leaves on the tree was very orderly.
meanings.sent2: The phyllotactic nature of the plant's leaves made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent3: The phyllotactic leaves on the stem seemed to be playing a game of musical chairs.
meanings.sent4: The phyllotactic arrangement of leaves resembled a carefully choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The phyllotactic positioning of the leaves looked like a perfectly arranged mosaic.

meanings.definition: Describing the pattern in which leaves are arranged on a plant.
meanings.sent1: The phyllotactic layout of the plant's leaves was quite fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The phyllotactic arrangement of leaves followed a specific sequence.
meanings.sent3: The phyllotactic leaves on the plant seemed to be gossiping with each other.
meanings.sent4: The phyllotactic pattern of leaves was like a secret code waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: The phyllotactic distribution of leaves created a beautiful symmetry in the garden.

meanings.definition: Referring to the spiral arrangement of leaves or other plant parts.
meanings.sent1: The phyllotactic spiral of the plant's leaves was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The phyllotactic twist of the leaves added an artistic touch to the plant.
meanings.sent3: The phyllotactic leaves on the stem appeared to be on a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: The phyllotactic spiral of leaves resembled a graceful ballet performance.
meanings.sent5: The phyllotactic coil of leaves created a sense of movement in the garden.
